ComicInfo.Summary:
Mr. Right Battles the Dead Presidents: After a gang of men who look exactly like several former US Presidents nearly kill his mother, Jeffrey summons his video game hero Mr. Right to avenge her by capturing the criminals.
Expecting Someone Heroic...!: The other-dimensional heroes Tesca and Gemel implore the wizard Edrice to bring them a hero from Earth; accessing teenager Randy O'Donnell while he's in the midst of playing his Dirk Danger video game, Edrice accidentally brings Randy to Bollucidar. Fortunately, Edrice's spell grants Randy all of Dirk Danger's powers and he helps Tesca and Gemel repel their enemies, the Malok. The battle won, Randy is sent back to Earth until Bollucidar needs him again.
ComicInfo.Writer: Ron Lim,Tom DeFalco,Ron Frenz,Tom DeFalco,Ron Frenz,Ron Lim
ComicInfo.Title: Mr. Right Battles the Dead Presidents; Expecting Someone Heroic...!
